name: Adam
scripture_text: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son...

name: Eve
scripture_text: And Adam called his wife's name Eve...
notes: Birth year estimated as contemporaneous with Adam

name: Cain
scripture_text: And Adam knew Eve his wife; and she conceived, and bare Cain...

name: Abel
scripture_text: And she again bare his brother Abel. And Abel was a keeper of sheep...

name: Cain's Wife
scripture_text: And Cain knew his wife; and she conceived...

name: Enoch
scripture_text: And Cain knew his wife; and she conceived and bare Enoch...

name: Seth
scripture_text: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son...

name: Enos
scripture_text: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos...

name: Kenan
scripture_text: And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:

name: Mahalalel
scripture_text: And Cainan lived seventy years and begat Mahalaleel:

name: Jared
scripture_text: And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:

name: Enoch
scripture_text: And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:

name: Methuselah
scripture_text: And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:

name: Naamah
scripture_text: And the sister of Tubalcain was Naamah.

name: Shem
scripture_text: These are the generations of Shem: Shem was an hundred years old, and begat Arphaxad two years after the flood:

name: Ham
notes: Birth year estimated relative to Shem

name: Japheth
notes: Birth year estimated relative to Shem

name: The Flood
scripture_text: And Noah was six hundred years old when the flood of waters was upon the earth.

name: Arphaxad
scripture_text: These are the generations of Shem: Shem was an hundred years old, and begat Arphaxad two years after the flood:

name: Salah
scripture_text: And Arphaxad lived five and thirty years, and begat Salah:

name: Eber
scripture_text: And Salah lived thirty years, and begat Eber:

name: Peleg
scripture_text: And Eber lived four and thirty years, and begat Peleg:
notes: In his days was the earth divided

name: Tarah
scripture_text: And Nahor lived nine and twenty years, and begat Terah:

name: Nahor
scripture_text: And Terah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran.

name: Milcah
scripture_text: And the name of Nahor's wife, Milcah, the daughter of Haran.

name: Haran
scripture_text: And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity.

name: Lot
scripture_text: And Haran begat Lot.

name: Abram
scripture_text: And Terah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran.

name: Sarai
scripture_text: And Abram and Nahor took them wives: the name of Abram's wife was Sarai.
notes: Half-sister and wife; birth year estimated

name: Hagar
scripture_text: Now Sarai Abram's wife had borne him no children: and she had an handmaid, an Egyptian, whose name was Hagar.

name: Ishmael
scripture_text: And Hagar bare Abram a son: and Abram called his son's name, which Hagar bare, Ishmael.

name: Isaac
scripture_text: And Abraham called the name of his son that was born unto him, whom Sarah bare to him, Isaac.

name: Rebekah
scripture_text: And, behold, Rebekah came out, who was born to Bethuel.

name: Esau
scripture_text: And the first came out red, all over like an hairy garment; and they called his name Esau.

name: Jacob
scripture_text: And after that came his brother out, and his hand took hold on Esau's heel; and his name was called Jacob.

name: Leah
scripture_text: And Laban had two daughters: the name of the elder was Leah.

name: Rachel
scripture_text: And the name of the younger was Rachel.

name: Reuben
scripture_text: And Leah conceived, and bare a son, and she called his name Reuben.

name: Simeon
scripture_text: And she conceived again, and bare a son; and said, Because the LORD hath heard.

name: Levi
scripture_text: And she conceived again, and bare a son; and said, Now this time will my husband be joined unto me.

name: Judah
scripture_text: And she conceived again, and bare a son: and she said, Now will I praise the LORD.

name: Dan
scripture_text: And Rachel said, God hath judged me, and hath also heard my voice.

name: Naphtali
scripture_text: And Rachel said, With great wrestlings have I wrestled with my sister.

name: Gad
scripture_text: And Leah said, A troop cometh: and she called his name Gad.

name: Asher
scripture_text: And Leah said, Happy am I, for the daughters will call me blessed.

name: Issachar
scripture_text: And Leah said, God hath given me my hire.

name: Zebulun
scripture_text: And Leah said, God hath endued me with a good dowry.

name: Joseph
scripture_text: And she called his name Joseph; and said, The LORD shall add to me another son.

name: Benjamin
scripture_text: And it came to pass, as her soul was in departing, she called his name Ben-oni.
notes: Born late in Jacob’s life; birth year estimated
